overview: One year after the events of 'Get Dead', Quart has finally coming to terms with living, Death (also known as the Grim Reaper) finds out about Quart's story and causes him to suffer a fatal heart attack for "cheating" death. Struggling to come to terms with Q's passing, his best friend Tristan Dan commits suicide to enter purgatory where he finds Quart and plots an escape back to the world of the living.
tagline: Quarts Been Through Hell, Now He Has To Stay Out Of It
title: Alive? In Purgatory
